info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 4 at 5:56PM CDT until April 8 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville TN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...
Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County.
For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Buffalo River near Lobelville.
* WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding continues to impact agricultural land and properties along the river including Dailey Loop, Caruthers Trace Lane, Lost Creek Rd near Gilmer Bridge Rd, and portions of the Buffalo River Country Club. Water covers Old State Hwy 13 south of School House Rd and Gilmer Bridge Rd Lost Creek Rd which are impassable. Water begins to impact waterfront properties off E 8th Ave in Leeper Bottom and approaches Cuba Landing Rd and Squeeze Bottom Rd.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 12.9 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river will fall to 9.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to 15.6 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will continue to rise to 16.5 feet early Tuesday morning. It will fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at noon CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING
